Vastu Guidelines

North Direction

Perfect for main entrance, living room and water features. Brings prosperity and positive energy.

East Direction

Ideal for kitchen and prayer room. Morning sunlight brings positive energy and good health.

South Direction

Best suited for master bedroom and heavy furniture. Provides stability and grounding energy.

West Direction

Suitable for children's room and storage. Evening sunlight brings peace and relaxation.

How It Works

At Econstruct, we are dedicated to turning your dream home into reality with a seamless, step-by-step process that ensures precision, quality, and satisfaction. Here's how we work.

01

Initial Design Concept

We create an initial draft based on your preferences, serving as the foundation for refining your dream home.

02

Design Phase

We finalize contracts, gather requirements, submit architectural drafts, and refine all design elements.

03

BOQ & Plan Approval

A detailed BOQ is provided, and we assist in obtaining necessary approvals from local authorities.

04

Construction Phase

We begin construction with expert supervision, ensuring quality and timely execution.

05

Completion & Handover

After thorough quality checks and inspections, we hand over your dream home.
